# Review Execution Skill

> **Source**: `.ai-agents/skills/review-execution.md`

This is a platform adapter for GitHub Copilot.

When this skill is invoked, load and execute the instructions from:
`.ai-agents/skills/review-execution.md`

## Quick Reference

- **Purpose**: Execute code review against checklists and standards
- **Used By**: Reviewer
- **Full Documentation**: See source file above
